ygData.subject: Re: Cats Eye Agate
ygData.msgSnippet: Cat s Eye Agate is a gem sold by the merchant in town who sells gems and stones.  So far I have found this gem in all the towns I have looked in (Felwith,
ygData.messageBody:
Cat's Eye Agate is a gem sold by the merchant in town who sells gems and
stones. So far I have found this gem in all the towns I have looked in
(Felwith, Qeynos, Freeport, and High Hold - In the keep). They usually sell
for about 2 gold 5 silver, though High Hold sells them for 2 gold 2 silver.

-Shadowwalker of Karana


> I find cats eye agates in lavastorm sometimes on the monsters there. It
> isn't a real frequent find though. I think I have found one or two in the
> last two months.
